brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy of ZD6474 in patients with metastatic
      breast cancer at 2 dose levels.

clinical_study.brief_title: This Study is to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of ZD6474 in Subjects With Metastatic Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Multicenter Phase II Study to Assess the Response of Subjects With Metastatic Breast Cancer Previously Treated With Anthracycline and Taxane Therapy With or Without Capecitabine to ZD6474 (100-mg or 300-mg Daily Oral Dose).

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Factorial Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
